Question: After another Rosenfels fumble, this person threw the 5-yard game-winning TD pass to Reggie Wayne.
Hints: Still, trailing by 6 late in the game this person led the Colts on a 77-yard TD drive to take a 21–20 lead.
This person passed for 194 yards and a touchdown in the loss.
This person passed for 311 yards as the Colts avoided their first 0–2 start since This person's rookie season.
